thread.title: Who wants to ring the closing bell on stock market’s bad days?
thread.title_full: Who wants to ring the closing bell on stock market’s bad days?

author: Financial News
title: Who wants to ring the closing bell on stock market’s bad days?
text:
Who wants to ring the closing bell on stock market’s bad days? By Mike Vilensky, The Wall Street Journal 04 September 2015 As the trading day came to an end on August 24, with US stocks down nearly 600 points, there was perhaps no more welcome sight than the executives at Cash America International, a publicly-traded pawnshop company scheduled to ring the New York Stock Exchange’s closing bell.
